meta.title: Gangañam - Save food and money
meta.description: The platform that connects people with restaurants and stores to save food surpluses at reduced prices, combating food waste.

hero.title: Rescue quality food and save with us!
hero.subtitle: Discover a responsible and economical way to enjoy excellent food. With Gangañam we connect people with local establishments to take advantage of food surpluses at incredible prices, taking care of both your wallet and the planet.

cases.title: Positive Impact on the Environment
cases.subtitle: Discover how Gangañam is helping to reduce food waste in our community.
cases.quote: Every meal saved is a step towards a more sustainable world

features.title: WHY USE GANGAÑAM
features.description: Join the community fighting food waste while enjoying quality food at reduced prices

items.title: Enjoy good food for half the original price
items.description: Save money while enjoying quality food from your favorite local establishments.

items.title: Save food near you
items.description: Discover and rescue surplus food from restaurants, cafes, bakeries and supermarkets in your area.

items.title: Help the environment
items.description: Reduce food waste and contribute to the fight against climate change.

items.title: Try new cafes and restaurants
items.description: Discover new local establishments while contributing to a good cause.

items.title: Quick and easy pickup
items.description: Pick up your food at the set time by simply showing your receipt in the app.

items.title: Surprise pack at a good price
items.description: Receive a surprise selection of products at a much lower price than their original value.

stats.title: HOW TO USE THE APP
stats.description: Follow these simple steps to start saving food with Gangañam

process.title: Discover Surprise Packs
process.description: Find available surprise packs at stores and restaurants closest to you.

process.title: Reserve and pay
process.description: Reserve your food and pay through the app securely and quickly.

process.title: Pick up your food
process.description: Go to the store at the specified pickup time and show your receipt in the app.

process.title: Enjoy your food!
process.description: Enjoy your food and feel proud of having done something good for the planet.

testimonials.title: Hear from Our Users
testimonials.description: Experiences from people using Gangañam to save food

items.title: A great way to discover new restaurants
items.description: Thanks to Gangañam, I've been able to try food from restaurants I didn't know, saving money and preventing that food from going to waste. A totally recommendable experience.

items.title: Unmatched savings and quality
items.description: Gangañam's surprise packs always exceed my expectations. The food is of excellent quality and worth much more than what you pay. Plus, I love contributing to reducing food waste.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to common questions about Gangañam and how you can start saving food
faq.contactDescription: If you couldn't find the answer to your question, our team is ready to help you join the movement against food waste.

items.question: How does Gangañam work?
items.answer: Gangañam connects users with restaurants, cafes, and stores that have food surpluses. These establishments create surprise packs with their leftover products of the day, which you can reserve through the app at a reduced price and pick up at the specified time.

items.question: What type of food can I find?
items.answer: You can find all kinds of food: from prepared dishes from restaurants, sandwiches and salads from cafes, bakery products, to fruits, vegetables, and other supermarket products. The content is a surprise, but always of quality.

items.question: How do I know the food is in good condition?
items.answer: All establishments associated with Gangañam comply with food safety regulations. The food offered is perfectly fit for consumption; they are simply surpluses that would otherwise be wasted. It is not expired food.

items.question: Can I choose what comes in my Gangañam pack?
items.answer: The packs are a surprise, which is part of the Gangañam experience. However, in the description of each establishment, you can see what type of products they usually offer to get an idea of the content.
